HowItWorks.title: How It Works
HowItWorks.subtitle: Learn any language in three simple steps.

step1.title: Step 1: Choose & Create
step1.subtitle: Start your language journey in seconds.
step1.selectNative: Select your native language from the left dropdown.
step1.chooseTarget: Choose target language from the right dropdown.
step1.describeWhatToLearn: Describe what you want to learn - be as specific as you need:
step1.example1: I have a job interview for a software developer position next week
step1.example2: Going to Barcelona, need help ordering food and buying museum tickets
step1.example3: Business meeting phrases for my trip to London
step1.proTip: The more details you provide about your situation, the more personalized and useful your flashcards will be!
step1.clickToChange: Click a language to change the interface language

step2.title: Step 2: Practice & Learn
step2.subtitle: Master new vocabulary through interactive exercises.
step2.multipleChoice: View your flashcard with 4 multiple-choice options and track your progress.
step2.checkTranslations: Select answers and flip cards to check translations. See your progress for each answer.
step2.listenPronunciation: Listen to correct pronunciation of words and example sentences in both languages.
step2.addMoreCards: Add more flashcards to any existing category with a single click.
step2.filterByLanguage: Filter flashcards by language to focus on what you want to learn.
step2.trackProgress: Track your learning progress with categories for 'Learning' and 'Mastered' items.
step2.filterDescription: Filter your flashcards by language or progress status to focus your learning:

step3.title: Step 3: Track & Improve
step3.subtitle: Monitor your progress and reach your goals faster.
step3.seeMastered: See what you've mastered and what's left to learn.
step3.setTargets: Set daily learning targets that work for you.
step3.viewCharts: View visual progress charts to stay motivated.
step3.smartRepetition: Benefit from smart repetition that adapts to your learning.
